meanings.definition: The act of reviving from a state of suspended animation.
meanings.sent1: The anabioses of the patient after the surgery were remarkable.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the anabioses of certain animals to understand their survival mechanisms.
meanings.sent3: The anabioses of the old computer made it seem like it was coming back to life.
meanings.sent4: The anabioses of the city after the disaster brought hope to its residents.
meanings.sent5: The anabioses of the plant after being watered was a beautiful sight to behold.

meanings.definition: A period of dormancy or inactivity followed by a return to life or activity.
meanings.sent1: The bear's anabioses during hibernation were crucial for its survival.
meanings.sent2: The seeds' anabioses in the soil signaled the beginning of spring.
meanings.sent3: The anabioses of the old car in the garage made it seem like it was waking up from a long nap.
meanings.sent4: The anabioses of the town after the long winter brought a sense of renewal.
meanings.sent5: The anabioses of the volcano after years of dormancy were both terrifying and awe-inspiring.
